CustomField.formula: IF(KPI_Average_Booking_Horizon__c = 0, "", IF(KPI_Average_Booking_Horizon__c <= 7, "1-7 days", IF(KPI_Average_Booking_Horizon__c <= 14, "8-14 days", IF(KPI_Average_Booking_Horizon__c <= 30, "15-30 days", IF(KPI_Average_Booking_Horizon__c <= 60, "1-2 months", IF(KPI_Average_Booking_Horizon__c <= 90, "2-3 months", IF(KPI_Average_Booking_Horizon__c <= 120, "3-4 months", IF(KPI_Average_Booking_Horizon__c <= 150, "4-5 months", IF(KPI_Average_Booking_Horizon__c <= 180, "5-6 months", IF(KPI_Average_Booking_Horizon__c <= 365, "6 months to 1 year", IF(KPI_Average_Booking_Horizon__c > 365, "More than a year","Error" )))))))))))
CustomField.label: Krux Average Booking Horizon
